Halevy [arr. Round]
Earls Barton 2nd Contest of the Northamptoshire Brass Band League, Division 1 Each band had to play Halevy snd then Moses in Egypt. Reported in Northampton Herald, 2nd July 1898 4 bands competed
May 22, 2012, 9:23 p.m. July 17, 2019, 12:02 p.m.
1 Kettering Rifles Thomas Seddon
2 Earls Barton Band John King Skinner
3 Kettering Town Silver Band Randolph Ryan
4 Finedon Old Prize Band Walter Reynolds
